select shop_type as type, operate_type as operateType, item_name as itemName, item_id as itemId, sum(item_num) as itemNum, sum(ta)+sum(bta) as amount, sum(ta) as consuYb, sum(tca) as ybPopulation, sum(ct) as ybNum, sum(bta) as bindYb, sum(bca) as bindPopulation, sum(bct) as bindNum from stat_goods_sales where 1=1 and is_open_day = #{stype} and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','') and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','')
AND area_id IN
#{item}
group by shop_type,item_name,item_id,operate_type order by amount,consuYb
